cmd: sh -c "logstash -e \"input { kafka { group_id => \\\"logstash-calls-inbound-ping-post\\\" client_id => \\\"logstash-calls-inbound-ping-post\\\" bootstrap_servers => \\\"kafka.service.consul:9092\\\" topics => [\\\"jangl.calls.inbound_ping_post\\\"] decorate_events => true consumer_threads => 1 auto_offset_reset => \\\"earliest\\\" type => \\\"inbound\\\" codec => avro_schema_registry { endpoint => \\\"http://$HOST:8081\\\" } value_deserializer_class => \\\"org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.ByteArrayDeserializer\\\" } } filter { date { match => [ \\\"request_timestamp\\\", \\\"UNIX_MS\\\" ] } } output { elasticsearch { hosts => [\\\"http://ingest.calls-elasticsearch.service.consul:9200\\\"] index => \\\"pingpost-%{+YYYY.MM.dd}\\\" } }\""
